title: Values & Work Preferences
description: What matters most to you in your career and life

questions.question: Rank these career aspects from most to least important to you (drag to reorder)
Imagine your ideal workday 5 years from now. Where are you, what are you doing, and who are you working with?
questions.placeholder: Describe a day you'd be excited to wake up to...

questions.question: What type of work environment appeals to you most?

options.label: Fast-paced startup - high energy, rapid change, wearing many hats
Established organization - clear structure, resources, defined processes
Government/Public sector - serving the public interest, stability
Creative agency - variety of projects and clients

questions.question: What motivates you in your work? (Select your top 3)

options.label: Helping others and seeing them benefit
Creating and building things from scratch

questions.question: What aspects of work would drain your energy or make you unhappy? What do you want to avoid?
questions.placeholder: e.g., 'I don't want to do the same thing every day' or 'I need to see the impact of my work' or 'I can't handle constant pressure'...

questions.question: How important is work-life balance to you?
questions.minLabel: I'm willing to sacrifice personal time for career growth
questions.maxLabel: Work-life balance is essential to my well-being

questions.question: How do you prefer to work with others?

options.label: Independently - I work best alone with minimal oversight
Collaboratively as equals - teamwork and shared decisions
Leading others - I enjoy guiding and coordinating teams
With clear guidance - I appreciate mentorship and direction

questions.question: What type of challenges energize you most?

options.label: Complex analytical problems requiring deep thinking
Hands-on practical problems with immediate results
Large-scale challenges that impact many people

questions.question: How important is it to see the direct impact of your work?
questions.minLabel: I'm fine working behind the scenes on long-term projects
questions.maxLabel: I need to see tangible results and impact regularly

questions.question: What does 'success' mean to you personally? How would you define a successful career and life?
questions.placeholder: Be honest and specific about what would make you feel fulfilled...

questions.question: Which work characteristics are most important to you? (Select top 4)

options.label: Social impact and contribution to society
Flexibility and autonomy in how I work

questions.question: How do you feel about high-pressure work and tight deadlines?

options.label: I thrive under pressure - it brings out my best work
I can handle it when necessary
Occasionally is fine, but not regularly
I prefer to avoid high-pressure situations
